1: Ri no'j cuyac ri rachoch, cuwik ruc' wukub rakan ja;
2: xebupil awaj che u banic ri nimak'ij, xuban jun je'licalaj u wa'l uva, ri xucoj puwi' ri mexa.
3: Xebutak c'u bic ri u pataninelab ixokib che u rakic qui chi' puwi' ri u tanatail ri tinimit:
4: “¡Chixpetok waral, c'ojolab ri man c'o ta iwetamabal!” Xutak u bixic chque ri man c'o ta qui no'j:
5: “Chixpetok che u tijic iwe ri nu wa, xukuje' che ruq'uiaxic iwe ri u wa'l nu uva ri nu k'obisam.
6: Chebiya' can tak ri e i conil, quixc'asi' c'u na; chixbinok jacha' ri winak ri quec'oxomanic.”
7: We cäpixbej ri man cäraj ta ri no'j xukuje' ri banal etzelal, xuwi c'u cach'äc na chi catutzuru xukuje' cayok'on c'ut.
8: We cäpixbej ri man cäraj ta ri no'j, cach'äc c'u na ri royowarem; chapixbej ri c'o u no'j, cach'äc c'u na ri u ya'ic a k'ij rumal.
9: Chatyan che ri ajno'j cux c'u na sibalaj ajno'j; chatijoj ri utzalaj winak cac'uxan c'u na ri retamanic.
10: Ri no'j cachapletajic rumal ri u ya'ic u k'ij ri Ajawaxel; ri retamaxic u wäch ri sibalaj tastalic are wa' ri c'o c'oxomanic.
11: Rumal ri no'j, q'ui' junab catc'asi' na, queq'uiyir na ri junab rech ri a c'aslemal.
12: We at ajno'j cawechbej na ri echbenic; we at banal nimal at catkajbenic.
13: Ri man c'o ta u no'j xak e junam ruc' jun ixok ri banal tzijtal, con xukuje' man c'o ta jas reta'm.
14: Cät'uyi puwi' jun tem, chuchi' tak ri rachoch, puwi' jun tanatic chupam ri tinimit,
15: quebusiq'uij c'ut ri queboc'owic ri e benak pa ri utzalaj be:
16: “¡Tisaj waral, c'ojolab ri c'ä maja' quiwesaj i no'j!” Cutak u bixic chque ri e conab:
17: “Ri eläk'am ja' are sibalaj qui' na; ri wa ri cätijow chic'uyal c'o na ri u qui'al.”
18: Ri e are' man queta'm ta c'ut chi ri e ula'm wi e u mujal cämical chic, camic chupam ri rajawibal ri cämical.
